website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy backing and absorbent material, but strongly scented pad can be a turn-off for owners and pets alike.
pros: Owners find these pads absorbent and able to hold up to clawing and gnawing from puppies and cats
cons: Many owners don’t like the scented pads
Pads may be too small for some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, great quality, more pads.
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at the quality of the pads, works just as well as store bought brands for a lower cost. The pads we usually purchase are $13 for 30. I noticed the review about the odor which had me worried though when I got my package there was no noticeable scent from the pads at it had me expect. Definitely going to be buying more in the future. The only bad thing was the size, they're a bit small, though not by much and my dogs are also small so it's not too much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 year old dog that is incontinent most of the time. These pads save me so much work and keep moisture away long enough to keep him comfortable until I can remove them. The price is so reasonable compared to other similar products. Very happy with product and company!
customer_reviews.author: jane goodall

customer_reviews.title: I have not had any problems with them but some of the reviews were not good so I layered them
customer_reviews.text: I use these for "Accidents" over night and when I am not home. I have not had any problems with them but some of the reviews were not good so I layered them. I didn't need too. These are for a 10lb dog and a 25 lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: ubet

customer_reviews.title: Unless you want pee in the carpet... Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETE TOTAL CRAP!!!! Don’t buy unless you want dog pee on your floors. I have CHIHUAHUAS!!! What if I had labs or some other big dog? If you enjoy the smell of dog pee in your carpet,,, this is the product for you. Can I give a minus 10 rating???? Update: DO NOT BUY!! They leak through to your floor. Must have changed these because they used to work great but now th de newer ones leak and I have dog pee on the floor. I will doubling up these on top of each other BUT WILL NOT BUY AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: WyogalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The price is what sold me on these initially. On first appearance, they're super thin. Thin enough that if you use a pad holder you might have some trouble keeping them in place (they just slip right out at the corners). They seem to contain or neutralize odors fairly well, and absorb pretty well. Urine takes a little while to dry and absorb though. I have only been using them about a day, so I this may change - but overall, I'd say they're pretty good! Especially if the price stays right ($16.99 for 100 is really not bad).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Womack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. They are large puppy training pads that has made life easier. They are well made and hold the liquid. My pet can find them easily and goes on them when needed. The price for the quantity is excellent
customer_reviews.author: S.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Meow! Meow! Happy Cat!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old cat no longer uses the litter box. She's my 3 legged wonder, and these pads have made our life much much happier! They're an excellent buy. The price is marvelous, and the pads are great! I've used more expensive, well known brands and notice nothing different in the quality, if anything, these are superior. They are less apt to cling to my kitchen tile, making the clean up much quicker and resoundingly cleaner. Isobel uses them for her little cat poops, too, and seems rather happy about it. A+ These are my my number one choice for pee pads. I've tried so many, and it's great to have a reliable product to return to!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Detektive

customer_reviews.title: Used for cat not dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have a beloved 14 year old cat with uti problems. he is on special cat food and it is controlled. For whatever reason he still likes to pee outside of the litter box at times. We tried everything doesnt matter how clean his litter box is...we tried shampooing the carpets....rubber and regular rugs...all with failed attempts. Sometimes making the smell worse. We decided to stop trying to stop it....and control the mess and smell. So...puppy pads were the answer. We wanted something cheap but works...these do just that. He pees on them and we change them daily. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: They have a pee smell.
customer_reviews.text: So these may be great if you don't mind a little pee smell and you're actually training a puppy. I use them to line bird cage for a bird who likes to walk around the cage bottom. So I have no need for pads that smell like they have already been peed upon. The bird does not seem to be bothered so I will keep them but I sure won't purchase these puppy pads again. I think I have previously purchased Amazon Basics puppy pads and they didn't have a smell. Like I said before the smell might be an asset if you really are training a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Really Bad Odor
customer_reviews.text: GOBUDDY Super Absorbent Pet Training Puppy Pads 22" x 22" 100 Count - As far as training pads go, these do the job. However, the odor from these pads (even before my dogs used them) was horrendous. I used these several times to be certain that the odor came from the pads. I just could not continue to use them. If you have these on a porch or away from rooms frequented by family/friends, they may work for you. Not for me. I was happy with the seller. (My dogs are Chihuahuas. I don't know how they would work for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: AnJoMom16

customer_reviews.title: These DO NOT ABSORB AT ALL!! Horrible! No good waste of money! UGHHH HAD to buy a new rug! NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: These pads claim to be absorbant but they are not! THEY DO NOT ABSORB AT ALL! Make a huge mess, track pee prints hours later! Not even good for a 4lb 9 week old puppy! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! THESE ARE THE WORST PADS I HAVE EVER USED! I use ALOT of pads, we breed French Bulldogs and go thru pads like crazy! These are a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great, and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: We bought these when we fostered an 8-week old puppy. They were so convenient to have on hand. I set one right outside his crate door, so when we got him up from a nap and had a little sprinkle accident from being excited (as we were picking him up to take him outside), the pad would catch it. I also kept one on the floor in his play pen during the day, and he would use it if I couldn't get to him before it was too late. Great for protecting your floors and keeping your sanity during potty training!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchaee again.. I looked at the reviews and I thought this was a good buy.. never again. When I took them out of the box I knew I was going to regret this purchase. Pads were super thin compared to my pads I purchased of Chewy.com there pads run a bit smaller, my dogs pee just sits on the surface no absorption I could smell her pee a mile a way, shes only 3 1/2 months. I find myself changing her pads everyday I would not recommend so I received a refund and I'm trying out Amazon pad I hope these are better.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: ... with these as my cat has decided it's a fun place to pee
customer_reviews.text: I have been lining the stairwell corner with these as my cat has decided it's a fun place to pee.... *rolls eyes* So I have put a couple of these around and they seem to do the trick enough. They're light weight, but absorbent. The 100 pack was more than enough for ... ever. They don't smell like plastic or anything either. Fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: I actually use this for my newborn's diaper changing table ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for my newborn's diaper changing table - in case she accidentally pees/poops on it. Saves me from always washing the chnging table cover and no excess clean up - just throw away the changing pad!
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I purchased 100 pack for the same price at Walmart. But we are trying to shop at Walmart less because we end up spending too much on random items. This brand is exactly the same kind of product as what Walmart carries. Same price, same quantity, and same quality. Very happy with my purchase. I’m happy that I got to avoid the store. Will purchase again next month!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Best puppy pads around!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this style of puppy pad from our local box store for a few years. Once we found these on Amazon, we said bye to the big guys and hello to these guys, a small business that suits our needs and helps regular people. These are the pads you order when you need quality. And the shipping? Top notch. We ordered these on a Saturday, they arrived that Monday. Pretty impressive for standard shipping if you ask me. Thanks again for a superior product, and keep and eye out for our next order!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worst puppy pads out there. They don't absorb well enough so be prepared to always wipe your pup's/dog's wee off of the floor. Definitely not worth the price. You may as well lay down paper towel for your doggo. Rather buy the AmazonBasics carbon pet training pads. They're the best we've ever used!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher and Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Super absorbent yet doesn’t soak through the bottom lining. My poor kitty had a urinary tract blockage. Upon coming home from the hospital my baby was leaking everywhere. Put these pads down all over my house, the floor, on the couch, bed etc. Did the job. Soft enough he was comfortable to sleep on and no piddles soaked through. Thank you!! These pads are a lifesaver ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Laurenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and with three little dogs - two with health problems and weather these work well I cover part of the floor with them in my sun room and due to size not as many are needed and they can use them multiple times during the day. Remove and replace used pads in evening ready for next day
customer_reviews.author: eva giovando

customer_reviews.title: These pads are the best! I tried a different brand
customer_reviews.text: These pads are the best! I tried a different brand, cheaper and 300ct. Waste of money. I just ordered more of these and will continue to. I have handicapped cats that can't use a litter box. I love Gobuddy!!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre L. Vasile

customer_reviews.title: Even good for crazy stubborn cats
customer_reviews.text: One cat decided she liked the carpet rather than the litter box. She is faithful to use these. Being a cat she feels the need to "bury her potty," so she bunches and folds this over on itself. Even with that clawing it does not leak. If it had enough odor control for cat pee, I would have given it five stars...but then these were not designed with cats in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Westholt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 ferrets, I put 2 of these down at 8 am and change them when I get home from work around 5pm. They don't absorb the urine for that many hours, when I get home most days there is urine under the pad and I have to use antibacterial wipes to clean up the mess. I'm sorry that I will not be able to purchase these from your small business anymore. I need to know that they will hold for the 9 hours that I'm not home.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Vessella

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do what’s necessary
customer_reviews.text: These odd are not useful or good at all. Every time My 8 week old would pee on it, the pee goes right through the pads and onto the back of them. Zero odor guard and very little attraction element considering my puppy would rather sleep on it than pee on it. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs too
customer_reviews.text: Great for my older girl. She just can't go 9 hours without relieving herself. She's very good about hitting the pad. Savings my flooring ! Great price considering what similar products cost. Delivered as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T.

customer_reviews.title: Our puppy wont use this.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product yet. So far our puppy just rips the paper to pieces / chews the paper up then vomited. Our puppy prefers to go on an old towel and wont use this product. 🤷🏽‍♀️ Seems like a waste of money. Maybe depends on what the dog likes - but you won’t know till you try it. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for kitties, too
customer_reviews.text: These are great little pads and we are so grateful to have them. We have a sick kitty who has stopped using the litter box and he finds the pads just fine. We have them all over the house and nearby the litter box. They make for easy clean up and save our floors from messes that could ruin the finish. Thanks for supplying such a needed item for an elderly cat.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Kayson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I use it with my puppy to catch his accidents. I fold and use them in my breeze litter box system and other sifting litter box I have. They are super absorbent and do the job for a very reasonable price! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why the ratings on these pads are so high. They have not worked well at all for us. Plus, they're really small. They are not as absorbent as most others, and the color keeps you from being able to see the pee until it's so saturated that its leaked through. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: peggy ford

customer_reviews.title: Leaks through the back plastic
customer_reviews.text: We have an older dog that can't hold it like he once could do he potties a lot on ouppmy pads (thank goodness). But we've bought other brands before and this one has been one of the worst we've had. Pee leaks through almost every time. Won't be buying again.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and absorb pet stuff great! Leaves less mess in my cats cage when I put this in there! 100 Pack is a great valie’
customer_reviews.author: Janel MH

customer_reviews.title: The only pads I'll use now!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a dozen different brands, I came across these and tried (because the other ones I normally got from Amazon weren't in stock) I'm so glad I did! These are by far the best training pads I've used. They hold a bunch more than the others, and none of that wet underside that happens sometimes. Our pups are skiddish about anything dark and I worried about the black but no prob. Just ordered more and these will be the ones we use until we don't have to anymore. Great product GOBUDDY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent potty pads
customer_reviews.text: These are decent. I purchased them because they were in a large bulk for such a great price. However, they were a lot smaller than I thought they would be, but I should have known by looking at the measurements. They do the job and I have only had one incident with the potty pads leaking through.
customer_reviews.author: Macey Lauren Booth

customer_reviews.title: These are inexpensive and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my mother, who has multiple cats. Some of the cats are seniors, and they often miss their litter boxes. The pads are "back up" protection for the floors, making it easier to clean up after the kitties. These pads have superior odor control.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Schledorn

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before and they seemed ok, no issue. I bought them more recently and literally have to put 2-3 one on top of the other so it doesn't get my floor wet. If i put just one down and my dog pees on there and i don't pick it up right away (i work all day. impossible to pick it up right away) it leaks right through to the floor. Every time i pick them up i have to mop the area. Tons of pee on the floor. If i put a few down, then it's ok, but i have to use 2-3 (in one spot) at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Chagas

customer_reviews.title: Great price & product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands & these were lower in price, so I ordered them. Very nice, light lemon scent & quality was as well as more pricer product. Include a pamphlet to show there other products & a discount coupon. Wished more suppliers would appreciate you w/future purchase coupons. I'll order again!
customer_reviews.author: Honest buyer user

customer_reviews.title: Using for Cat Litterbox
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I am using News to go underneath my pellet litter box for my large cat. Because he is big, his number ones often miss. I have TWO under the box in the photo. They over-lap a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Actually worksI
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much money in search of doggie pads. Too thin, not enough absorbency and messy. I can actually say that I have found great absorbent pads that truly work for my bichon/cockerspaniel 26 lb doggie. I will be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: GOD IS IN CONTROL

customer_reviews.title: They work, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yorkie, live in an area where we get very cold snowy winters....to cold for my baby to go out side to do her business. I have tried different brands for different prices and I have found these to be the best. She misses sometimes no matter the size, but these are as they claim absorbent and generally do not collect moisture under them!!! I am totally satisfied and will continue to purchase this product!!! Definitely recommend these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an incontinent, elderly dog and was hoping for even just the smallest amount of decrease in the odors from her toileting in her kennel. These pads are really very effective. I have to clean her kennel upwards of 3x a day from urine and bowel messes and our house no longer smells bad. We used to be able to come home and say, "Belle had an accident again." Now we aren't really even sure until we check. We will definitely be buying these from now on. The seller was fast with shipment and the price for what we received was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Household member

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Not theseTraining pads. No lemon scent. The moisture leaked thru soaking the floor. I had to change the pad so often that I went thru 100 in about 10 days. My dog is 4 pounds so that should not have happened. The only good thing I found about the pads was the price..but I guess you get what ya pay for...
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son's crazy chihuahua who was always making a mess in the house. She is not too bright, but she has learned to go on the pads (most of the time). Every now and then she will mis the spot, which I don't know why since the pads are twice her size, but she is a chihuahua so I guess that explains it. Overall I'm VERY happy with these and easier cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: N. L.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable and Papi likes them!
customer_reviews.text: My little Papi Chulo knows exactly what his pads are for, and since he is a less than 5 lb. Chihuahua, takes about a month to go through a package. I love the thickness and durability of each pad, as well as its odor-masking characteristic.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Boyd

customer_reviews.title: U get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap...Idk what to say except these suck and are a waste of my money. I have used 4 pads and they do not absorb like I feel they're supposed to. Tried to go cheaper than my other brand and I'll be going back to those!!
customer_reviews.author: NCMA_mama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our small dogs, who do not like to go outside to go potty. They are very good and absorbent - good value for the price. I would like for them to have some adhesive on the bottom, because they are always getting kicked around and bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb fast enough!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my cat. They do not absorb fast enough. He scratches to cover and crumbles it in the corner and the urine all spills out because it’s not absorbed. Way to slow.
customer_reviews.author: Jodielynn35

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.text: The frame around the pads r all different widths. Very thin n lightweight..so dog usually will accidentally fold edge. Been using All Absorb for years..they r the very best I've used. By a longshot.
customer_reviews.author: Nell taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the carbon pads for about a year I decided to try this brand for a change but I’m very disappointed as they are sooo thin compared to the previous brand . Will not be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely just fine
customer_reviews.text: life get crazy round my place, how about yours. I mean I wouldn’t trade it for nothing. I’m merely saying kids messes, dog messes, work messes ect. This product help take some of at least one of those crazies away.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for kittens too!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the floor for my foster kittens to protect me carpet and bathroom floors. They are a life saver. Helps protect the floor from accidents and from cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna!!

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: they are super absorbs for my kitty who pees on the floor, and they are way better than the white ones b/c they don't appear dirty all the time they are just black.
customer_reviews.author: shoop

customer_reviews.title: GREAT around our Cat's Litter box!
customer_reviews.text: These are economical and we use them around our cat's little box for when the cat "misses" the box. Easy to fold in, fold up and dispose then replace. Saves time cleaning up the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for some time and they work very well. I have a small chiweenie that always don't make it outside to do her thing. They work well at absorbing the liquid. The size I order is great for a smaller dog and I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and absorbent! ONLY ONES I USE!
customer_reviews.text: These pads are absorbent, size is correct as stated. The plastic bottom is thick enough that there's never any leakage. This is a great price for the quality .
customer_reviews.author: GayleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog is always safe, indoors, thanks to GOBUDDY puppy pads!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Go Buddy pads. My tiny dog, Rosie, can't be left alone, outside. Unfortunately, my last dog was poisioned when she was left out back while I was gone. That's never going to happen again. The Go Buddy pads are a life saver! Figuratively & literally! I care for My mother and I'm gone all day. My dog is safe indoors and the go buddy pads dry very quickly. It's even better that you can't even smell anything!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kay Docherty

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for our puppy these are more absorptive than others that we bought I could tell because one our bigger dogs used it with no problem no leak from her use. It is thicker than the others ones we bought in the store
customer_reviews.author: cellis

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for a big puppy
customer_reviews.text: These are no different than ones you buy at Walmart. I was looking for more absorption, but I guess they don’t make them. Everyone I’ve tried are the same
customer_reviews.author: Debora Hignite

customer_reviews.title: Poor to non-existent odor control
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for older dogs and have used a similar product for some time. I bought the "charcoal" version in hopes of better odor control. This product is, in fact, a poorer product in that regard. It's absorption is fine, the pads do not leak, etc. on par with the other similar products, but odor control is non-existent and perhaps even amplifies the smell of urine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of wee wee pads for the price you pay, but I often had to double them because they were not thick enough/absorbent enough and they would leak through on to the floor
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Pads leaked quite often
customer_reviews.text: This pad seemed to have a higher leak-through rate than other pads. I switched to the Sam's club branded pads and though it leaked at times, but the rate seems to be lower than this product.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: absorbant
customer_reviews.text: I like these just fine, and I have purchased a lot of different kinds! The only reason for 4 stars, is I cannot smell the lemon scent after package was open for a couple days. :(
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. They get the job done. If pups miss the pad and it gets moist under pad and you step on it you could skip. I’ve done that a few times
customer_reviews.author: Pattig00

customer_reviews.title: Super product!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has a habit of using the very edge of the pads, so there was a messy clean up. With this product, that problem is solved!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Works as it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Small sick old dog, pee anywhere, 1 room dedicated to the peeing only with pads instead of carpet. Dog happy, wife happy, kids happy, I will have a beer now.
customer_reviews.author: Brownline

customer_reviews.title: These carbon pads are awesome! It is hard to tell if they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These carbon pads are awesome! It is hard to tell if they are used but no more urine odor! That is a huge help. I was forced to purchase these because the white Go Buddy's were out of stock. I was skeptical and the black color was freaky at first but now we love them. My diabetic Chihuahua doesn't have a choice but to use them when I'm at work. So no urine odor is a plus. Will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately they do leak
customer_reviews.text: They do attract my dog who is a year old and I suspect he was already pad trained. However, they do leak so don't put it on carpet. Update: They don't always all leak. I bought a pet pad holder just to be safe. Only $8.39
customer_reviews.author: P. Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor dogs 🐶
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5.lb shih tzu who uses them since he stays indoors, we love to keep him close and these work wonders and smell great! The are heavy enough to not shift under the dog while they are doing their business and large enough that you would only need 1 to cover an area for a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel_R

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: Not as absorbing as what I’m used to. I prefer the carbon pee pads of another brand which effectively turn liquid to gel immediately. They do the job okay, but probably would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: September VK

customer_reviews.title: cleaning mat/dropcloth
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gun and parts cleaning. The padding absorbs grease, oil and solvent. The plastic backing seems to be resistant the the solvents I've used so far, and some are pretty stout solvents. When I'm done, I just roll it up and throw it away. Easy cleanup. The white absorbent makes small parts easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: They work. My dog has Cushing's Disease, and she pee's on these pads. Fortunately, she doing better on a medication the vet prescribed now, but what's amazing is that she went on the pads on her own. I did tell her to, but something else might attract dogs to it.
customer_reviews.author: 1957 Speedster

customer_reviews.title: ... Lhasa Apso is please with the quality of this super absorbent puppy pad
customer_reviews.text: Bella Bella the Lhasa Apso is please with the quality of this super absorbent puppy pad. She twirls to pee and poop on it during her old lady incontinent moments. It's soft on her tushy and enjoy it also as her form of toilet paper after her business. It keeps the carpets clean and fresh for play time.
customer_reviews.author: J go

customer_reviews.title: Large pad size, good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these pads. They provide good coverage and there is plenty of space on the pad for my small breed puppy. They do leak through a bit if he has a really full bladder, so I’ve removed one star for that. I would recommend the pads.
customer_reviews.author: Ro S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I've order this product a few times I really like it for the amount you get for the price. I've had no problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica bollinger

customer_reviews.title: these are just ok
customer_reviews.text: this size is much too small for my 11 pound chihuahua. i decided to just keep them, and use two side by side. which is a waste, in my opinion. but i just had an accident and have no way to get anywhere to return them, with 2 broken ankles. and to have to bend down everytime she wets, is hard on me in a wheel chair
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Works better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about these based off of some of the reviews. Even more skeptical when I opened the package and saw how thin the pads were. I have a 20 pound miniature pinscher who we leave pads out for regularly for over nights. I must say they work rather well and hold the urine without leaking despite how thin they are. I would buy again for sure. Was a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These mats absorb and it gels as described. I would prefer if they were a little stiffer as once they are wet, my pet's feet can wrinkle up the edges which makes the target area smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are used it for kittens.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a puppy pad and it works perfectly. Not a whole lot more to say. I lined the kitten box with them as well as underneath their litter box if a kitten was there there was a puppy pad and thank god because they were messy for a bit there. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy Lea

customer_reviews.title: Stellar for odor control. Slightly substandard on absorbency.
customer_reviews.text: These are good on the scent contro in small spaces (we buy them for traveling with our service dogs), but it’s hard to tell when they’ve been used and need a fresh mat put down. They also seem to be less absorbent than the better regular type pads.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Works for small dogs; check for better prices in case
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, but I have a small Yorkie who doesn't really let out a lot at one time. I need quantity over quality so if you're in the same boat you should try these. Make sure they are the cheapest though, I can sometimes find pads for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Kitena Suttles

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good product. I trained my pet rabbit to use puppy pads to do its thing. It will only do it on puppy pads now. Easy to train: Where ever the rabbit or pet goes (its thing, free roaming), pick the scat up with a paper towel and place puppy pad at that spot. Place scat back on puppy pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. They are inexpensive, absorbency is very good, easy to clean and the size is just right. I use them in the carrier too.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb at all
customer_reviews.text: NOT SUPER ABSORBENT!! The pad does not absorbed the liquid at all, it just sits on the pad. Liquid will easily leak off the edge of the pad. Makes such a mess. Guess this is what you get when your try to save money!! Don’t waste your money on these, spend more and buy the petco pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have repeat ordered
customer_reviews.text: Pee turns to gel quickly so there is not as much border overflow as some brands. Have ordered the carbon type twice. Thicker than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: These puppy training pads are good quality and priced just right. I really liked them and would highly recommend all pet owners to try them, they are really a great buy. Seller was great too. received them fast. Very good company service. Will certainly reorder from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these to put under my cats' shared litter box. They tend to make a mess, despite my best efforts, but these pads have made cleanup much easier and prevented stains and odors. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jahanara U.

customer_reviews.title: They do not deodorize
customer_reviews.text: These pads are too think and do not deodorize at all. I'll be going back to my Pet Smart brand. Not that much more expensive, but they deodorize very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 yr old Bischon and he has decided that he doesn't want to go outside any more to pee, so I put these under the kitchen trash can (where he wants to go) and there is no odor and are very absorbent
customer_reviews.author: P. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have small dogs and go through puppy pads very quickly. These are great and have a lemony scent. I like the price and believe it is a great value. Love the convenience of having them delivered too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn G.

customer_reviews.title: No leakage under pad when wet.
customer_reviews.text: My dog peed what seemed like a gallon on the pad before I woke up...and this pad contained it all. I am now convinced these pads are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: fox5live

customer_reviews.title: Absorbing and odor free
customer_reviews.text: My small yorkie is both house trained and trained to go outside. But sometimes he gets little tendencies to pee in front of a mat, or next to it etc. But so far with these mats, he’s been going right on them. They don’t smell bad afterward either and they absorb well. I don’t have to clean up any damp spots on the floor when i throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for birds too
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my Sun Conure, on the floor under is cage and on top where he plays since he rarely stays in his cage, he can be a very messy boy
customer_reviews.author: CrabbyChick

customer_reviews.title: We went back to using what we had used in the past and all is good now.
customer_reviews.text: The pads leaked and left urine underneath so we had to clean up after every pad was used. We went back to using what we had used in the past and all is good now.
customer_reviews.author: Disney247

customer_reviews.title: good puppy pads
customer_reviews.text: It said they were lemon scented but I didn't notice any scent, which is fine with me. These are the size pads I normally buy but these ended up being just a little less expensive than what I usually buy. They are absorbent. As long as the price stays the same, I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: DVD Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Needed them in a pinch, worked fine
customer_reviews.text: These will leak after being left on the floor, but we always pick them up right away. Good size, good price
customer_reviews.author: Jen Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest puppy pads I’ve tried and I’ve had no issue with them. They do not have the adhesive pads on the corners to keep them in place, but we did just fine without. Extensive use to date and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma

customer_reviews.title: No odor and stays dry
customer_reviews.text: these are hands down the BEST puppy pad I have ever purchased. I have a very elderly pet that has such a hard time with her bladder. I will buy again and again. EXCELLENT odor control and wetness control!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: GoBuddy Training Puppy Pads are great!
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered these puppy pads and they are great! Will keep ordering them from this seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the dog I bought them for was put to ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the dog I bought them for was put to sleep the day after they were delivered. My vet also runs Wild and Free Rehabilitation organization and use the pads a lot. I donated the package to them. When I get a puppy later this year, I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: LorChaBud

customer_reviews.title: Leak like crazy gross
customer_reviews.text: These pads suck!!!! I have to put about 3 down to get them to not leak through. Not worth the money when you have to use so many and still stuck your hand in pee!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa sullivan

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: These pee pads work great for holding my Yorkies pee and doesn’t leak through. I’m able to use the pad for a full day with no issues of it tearing or not holding liquids.
customer_reviews.author: melina

product_meta.title: GOBUDDY Super Absorbent Pet Training Puppy Pads 22" x 22" 100 Count - Choose from Lemon Scent & Natural Scent
feature_bullets: Package Includes: Go Buddy Super Absorbent Pet Training Puppy Pads 22" x 22"

ABSORBENT AND QUICK-DRYING: Go Buddy Pet Training Pads' superior 5-layer design optimizes the pads to be super absorbent and leak-proof. The top layer of the pads is a durable, non-woven fabric that is highly absorbent, quick-drying, and resistant to scratches and tears. The bottom layer is a waterproof polyethylene film that provides a plastic lining around the pad and backs the pad to provide floors and carpets with maximum moisture protection.

ODOR-REDUCING: Go Buddy Pet Training Pads contain a layer of ultra-absorbent polymer which locks in moisture by turning urine into gel instantly. The polymer also has an odor neutralizer that eliminates urine odors and leaves a lasting clean scent.

IDEAL FOR VARIETY OF DOGS: Go Buddy Pet Training Pads are great for training puppies before housebreaking, assisting aging dogs or elderly dogs, use by dogs left alone for long periods of time, and as an alternative to going potty outside for indoor pets. The Go Buddy 5-Layer Design also includes a tissue paper layer which contains built-in puppy attractant to accelerate house training by drawing your pet to the pad.

CUSTOMER FIRST: Reliable customer service is our priority. The product comes with the Go Buddy Brand Guarantee. If you are not fully satisfied with your product, we readily offer a hassle-free 30-Day Money Back Guarantee.
